aboutpara: I am iOS-dev who is looking for opportunity as an intern. Since 2020 august, I have been learning Swift and developing different kinds of junior level projects. With a streak of more than 200 days of real 5-12 hours learning&coding sessions on a daily basis. I mainly focused only on SwiftUI after learning the Swift language. I‚Äôve came to world of programming when I was 16 and since then I haven't stopped for a second, simple explanation to this is ‚ÄúI am addicted to learning and coding‚Äù. Swift is one my favorite languages. If you are looking for an intern for your company, I am open to any offers.

resume.description: I used to work as web developer and shopify expert. Have experience in variety fields.

experiences.bullets: Came to Premium Digital as a Full-stack junior developer, not having enough experience was not an issue, because we had middle developers in our company, who used to help me. In general improved my skills both working with clients and understanding the business logic.
CloudJoy is a leading dropshipping company in China.
